original: LINDBERG, Per Gösta, Ingenjör, Sandviken, f Sthlm 8/12 02 av dir G L o Hillevi Streng-bohm, gm Inez Bergman. Realex, Filipstads bergssk. Anst f reklam o försäljn h ing.fma Fritz Egnell Sthlm 22—23, metallograf Nord Kullager AB Gbg 24—25, metallogr o reklamm Fagersta Br AB o ds försäljn.bol Br.koncernens AB Fagersta 26—43, reklamch Sandvikens Jernvks AB :s transportöravd sed. 43. Av trycket: Art om brukshist o d särsk om Fagersta i tidskr o publ. Hobbies: Fotografering, trädgårdsodling.
translated: LINDBERG, Per Gösta, Engineer, Sandviken, b. Stockholm 8/12/02 to director G L and Hillevi Strengbohm, m. Inez Bergman. Completed Realex exam, Filipstad Mining School. Worked in advertising and sales at Fritz Egnell in Stockholm 22-23, metallographer at Nord Kullager AB in Gothenburg 24-25, metallographer and advertising at Fagersta Ironworks AB and sales company of the Br.koncernen AB Fagersta 26-43, advertising manager at Sandvikens Jernvks AB's transport department since 43. Published: Articles on industrial history and specifically on Fagersta in magazines and publications. Hobbies: Photography, gardening.

structured.name: Per Gösta Lindberg
structured.description: Per Gösta Lindberg was a Swedish engineer known for his work in various companies in the advertising, metallography, and sales industries. He was born on December 8, 1902, in Stockholm, Sweden. Per completed his Realex exam at Filipstad Mining School. He was married to Inez Bergman. Per Lindberg's career included working at Fritz Egnell from 1922 to 1923 in Stockholm, Nord Kullager AB from 1924 to 1925 in Gothenburg, and Fagersta Ironworks AB and Br.koncernen AB from 1926 to 1943 in Fagersta. Since 1943, Per has served as an advertising manager at Sandvikens Jernvks AB's transport department in Sandviken. He has also contributed articles on industrial history, especially related to Fagersta, in various magazines and publications. Per Lindberg's hobbies include photography and gardening.
